name: Druidcraft
description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range: You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect persists for 1 round. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

engineHook.notes: Narrative-only spell with multiple options. No direct combat mechanics to implement.
